attributes.action: Run media advertisment for vegetarianism by 2011
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My name Is Megan Millar I am 15 years of age and have chose to start a petition to enlighten the public to the cruelty and suffering behind the meat and meat products we consume on a daily basis. I would also like everyone to know the postitives of living a healthy vegetarian lifestyle. 

Commercials on television will feature as part of my campaign.

The media advertisments will explain to people that we do not need to comsume meat as much as we do on a daily basis and could make our cities and towns better places if we increase the number of vegetarians/vegans living in our communities we could lower death rates and increase healthier minds and bodies of the people around us. 

Being vegetarian Is the best thing I have ever done with my life and has opened my eyes to a whole new way of thinking. I think positivley and creatively. I am far more greatfull and respectful towards everyday things In my life. This is all because I realised the effects of being a daily comsumer of meat and decided to do something about it, from that I became a vegetarian.

Thank You For Listening To Me.
Megan Millar (:
